sourcesContent:
<template>

  <v-chart class="chart" :option="option" />

</template>
<script>

import { use } from "echarts/core";
import { CanvasRenderer } from "echarts/renderers";
import { LineChart, BarChart, BoxplotChart } from "echarts/charts";
import {
  TitleComponent,
  TooltipComponent,
  LegendComponent
} from "echarts/components";
import VChart, { THEME_KEY } from "vue-echarts";

use([
  CanvasRenderer,
  LineChart,
  TitleComponent,
  TooltipComponent,
  LegendComponent,
  BarChart,
  BoxplotChart
]);

export default {
  name: "HeatmapGraphic",
  components: {
    VChart
  },
  provide: {
    [THEME_KEY]: "ligth"
  },
  data() {
    return {
      option: {
        title: {
          text: 'Ventas por restaurante',
          subtext: 'Fake Data',

        },
        tooltip: {
          trigger: 'axis',
          axisPointer: {
            type: 'cross'
          }
        },
        xAxis: {
          type: 'category',
          boundaryGap: false,
          // prettier-ignore
          data: ['00:00', '01:15', '02:30', '03:45', '05:00', '06:15', '07:30', '08:45', '10:00', '11:15', '12:30', '13:45', '15:00', '16:15', '17:30', '18:45', '20:00', '21:15', '22:30', '23:45']
        },
        yAxis: {
          type: 'value',
          axisLabel: {
            formatter: '{value} W'
          },
          axisPointer: {
            snap: true
          }
        },

        series: [
          {
            name: 'Electricity',
            type: 'bar',
            smooth: true,
            // prettier-ignore
            data: [300, 280, 250, 260, 270, 300, 550, 500, 400, 390, 380, 390, 400, 500, 600, 750, 800, 700, 600, 400],
            markArea: {
              itemStyle: {
                color: 'rgba(0, 0,0, 1)'
              },
              data: [
                [
                  {
                    name: 'Morning Peak',
                    xAxis: '07:30'
                  },
                  {
                    xAxis: '10:00'
                  }
                ],
                [
                  {
                    name: 'Evening Peak',
                    xAxis: '17:30'
                  },
                  {
                    xAxis: '21:15'
                  }
                ]
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            name: 'Electricity',
            type: 'line',
            smooth: true,
            // prettier-ignore
            data: [300, 280, 250, 260, 270, 300, 650, 700, 400, 390, 380, 890, 400, 500, 200, 750, 800, 700, 600, 400],
            markArea: {
              itemStyle: {
                color: 'rgba(0, 0,0, 1)'
              },
              data: [
                [
                  {
                    name: 'Morning Peak',
                    xAxis: '07:30'
                  },
                  {
                    xAxis: '10:00'
                  }
                ],
                [
                  {
                    name: 'Evening Peak',
                    xAxis: '17:30'
                  },
                  {
                    xAxis: '21:15'
                  }
                ]
              ]
            }
          },
        ],

      }
    };
  }

}
</script>
<style scoped>
.chart {
  height: 400px;
}
</style>
